prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Brass, Piano, Reed, Bass, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Drums, Brass, Piano, Reed, and Bass, but no Guitar.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Drums, Brass, Piano, Reed, and Bass, omitting the Guitar.

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Drums, Brass, Piano, Reed, and Bass, with no Guitar.
